scenes.description: Ending MC where IRyS thanks the audience for the birthday live and the 1 million subscriber milestone.
Ending graphic showing the live title.

subtitles.original: ...ああ
subtitles.english: ...Ah

subtitles.original: ずっと
subtitles.english: Always,

subtitles.original: 特別で
subtitles.english: so special

subtitles.original: 大切で
subtitles.english: and precious,

subtitles.original: またこの季節が巡ってくる
subtitles.english: this season comes around again.

subtitles.original: 初めて二人で話した放課後
subtitles.english: That time after school when we first talked,

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない笑顔探していた
subtitles.english: I was looking for a smile no one knew about.

subtitles.original: 遠くであなたのハシャいでる声に
subtitles.english: Hearing your playful voice in the distance,

subtitles.original: なぜだか胸が痛くなったの
subtitles.english: my heart somehow started to ache.

subtitles.original: 変わってゆく事を怖がってたの
subtitles.english: I was afraid of things changing.

subtitles.original: ずっと友達のままでいれる気がした
subtitles.english: I felt like we could stay friends forever.

subtitles.original: 終わってく物など無いと思った
subtitles.english: I thought that nothing would ever end.

subtitles.original: 果てしない時間の中で あなたと出会えた事が
subtitles.english: Meeting you in the midst of endless time

subtitles.original: 何よりもあたしを強くしてくれたね
subtitles.english: has made me stronger than anything else.

subtitles.original: 夢中でかける明日に 辿り着いたとしても
subtitles.english: Even if I reach the tomorrow I'm racing toward,

subtitles.original: あなたは ずっと
subtitles.english: you will always

subtitles.original: 特別で
subtitles.english: be special

subtitles.original: 大切で
subtitles.english: and precious,

subtitles.original: またこの季節がやってくる
subtitles.english: as this season comes around once more.

subtitles.original: いつまでも忘れないと あなたが言ってくれた夏
subtitles.english: The summer you told me you'd never forget...

subtitles.original: 時間が流れ 今頃あたしは 涙がこぼれてきた
subtitles.english: Time has passed, and now, my tears are falling.

subtitles.original: あなたと過ごした日々を この胸に焼き付けよう
subtitles.english: I'll burn the days I spent with you into my heart,

subtitles.original: 思い出さなくても 大丈夫なように
subtitles.english: so I'll be okay even if I don't remember.

subtitles.original: いつか他の誰かを 好きになったとしても
subtitles.english: Even if I fall in love with someone else someday,

subtitles.original: あなたは ずっと
subtitles.english: you will always

subtitles.original: 特別で
subtitles.english: be special

subtitles.original: 大切で
subtitles.english: and precious,

subtitles.original: またこの季節が巡ってくる
subtitles.english: as this season comes around again.

subtitles.original: to my very first 3D birthday live!
subtitles.english: to my very first 3D birthday live!

subtitles.english: in making this live possible
